title: Price ceiling above Peq has no effect

content.question: If the market depicted in the diagram above is initially in equilibrium, which of the following will result from the governmentâ€™s setting a price ceiling at P3?

choices.label: Quantity demanded will exceed quantity supplied.
Quantity supplied will exceed quantity demanded.

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets
